ValidationRule.description: A contract can only be created if the Account has a Corporate Tracking code.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($User.B2b_Bypass_Validation_Rules__c), ISNEW(), AccountId__r.FCE__c == NULL, AccountId__r.RecordType.Name = 'Corporate Account' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Account must have a Corporate Tracking code.
